Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the Server. Whenever one Server object is created and run, it waits for connections arriving over the network and dispatches the setup to a ServerConnectionSetupHandler object

  • Field Summary

    • start

      public void start()
      This is the main method of the server, which runs infinitely until the server is shut down. This method accepts inbound connections and dispatches them
